channel.title: Help with a client
channel.description:
Ok, so i used to be on moparscape, learning to develope. I have been gone on Military issues. I was wondering if somebody could Point me in the direction of the best client i could use to run a server. Or just work on one.
Thanks, X X D D S X X.
EDIT: I think i might have put this in the wrong section, Could Somebody possibly move it to Client help please?

item.title: Help with a client
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Just search the download sections for a good source.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html
